content: market bag crochet pattern © 2021 by susan kennedy of pretty peaceful the start of round 18 add a stitch marker in the last chain 6 space of round 29 a safety pin makes a great stitch marker place a stitch marker in the last chain-6 space of round 29 turn do not fasten_off shape first side row 1-3 chain 6 single_crochet in next chain-6 space 6 times turn 6 chain-6 spaces made row 4 chain 3 single_crochet in next chain-6 space 6 times turn 6 chain-3 spaces made row 5 chain 2 counts as 1st st 3 half_double_crochet in chain-3 space half_double_crochet in single_crochet 5 times 3 half_double_crochet in last chain-3 space turn 24 half_double_crochet sts row 6 chain 2 counts as 1st st 23 half_double_crochet 24 half_double_crochet sts fasten_off maui market bag crochet pattern © 2021 by susan kennedy of pretty peaceful shape second side row 1 attach cc yarn in 11th chain-6 space from the marked chain-6 space in round 29 with a slip_stitch chain 1 single_crochet in same chain-6 space chain 6 single_crochet in chain-6 space 6 times turn 6 chain-6 spaces made work row 2-6 as for first side do not fasten_off maui market bag crochet pattern © 2021 by susan kennedy of pretty peaceful first handle round 1 chain 1 single_crochet into ends of row 5 and 6 single_crochet in chain-3 space from row 4 single_crochet in next single_crochet chain 3 single_crochet in chain-6 space 13 times single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in chain-3 space single_crochet into ends of each row chain 75 slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet of round round 2 chain 2 half_double_crochet evenly around working 1 half_double_crochet in each st and 3 half_double_crochet in each chain-3 space slip stitch to top of starting chain-2 round 3 chain 2 half_double_crochet in each st slip_stitch to top of starting chain-2 fasten_off maui market bag crochet pattern © 2021 by susan kennedy of pretty peaceful second handle attach cc in top of starting chain-2 of row 1 on other side of bag with a slip_stitch work rounds 1-3 as for first handle finishing round 1 attach cc in any st on inside opening of bag with a slip_stitch chain 2 half_double_crochet in each st around slip_stitch to top of starting chain-2 fasten_off weave in ends share your project with #mauimarketbag on instagram tag @prettypeacefulcrochet too please feel free to sell finished items made from this pattern as long as you give design credit as maui market bag crochet pattern by pretty peaceful not for commercial use please do not share photos of this pattern only share the link to the pattern pdf on ravelry or etsy thank you for your support maui market bag crochet pattern © 2021 by susan kennedy of pretty peaceful
